stampede.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when a group of people all want to do the same thing at the same time
stampede.translation[0].definitions[0].e: a stampede to buy shares in high-tech companies
stampede.translation[0].definitions[1].d: when a group of large animals or people suddenly start running in the same direction because they are frightened or excited
stampede.translation[1].definitions[0].d: if a group of large animals or people stampede, they suddenly start running together in the same direction because they are frightened or excited
stampede.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Children came stampeding out of the school doors.
